directions: In a large salad bowl, combine the Romaine, cheese, green onion, cucumber, carrot, oregano, poultry seasoning and celery. Add enough salad dressing to coat, toss and serve.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce- rinsed, dried and chopped
1/2 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped
title: Tasty Home Salad
